Structs/ReadMovementsQuery.html#/s:14Dat.name: storeId
Structs/ReadMovementsQuery.html#/s:14Dat.abstract: Store id. Used to filter by store

Structs/ReadMovementsQuery.html#/s:14Dat.name: categoryId
Structs/ReadMovementsQuery.html#/s:14Dat.abstract: Category id. Used to filter by category

Structs/ReadMovementsQuery.html#/s:14Dat.name: paymentId
Structs/ReadMovementsQuery.html#/s:14Dat.abstract: Payment id. Used to filter multi-payment movements

Protocols/MovementsSum.html#/s:14DataMan.name: sum
Protocols/MovementsSum.html#/s:14DataMan.abstract: Sum of movements for the given category or store

Protocols/Movement.html#/s:14DataManagem.name: isPaid
Protocols/Movement.html#/s:14DataManagem.abstract: Describes if movement is paid or is not

Protocols/Movement.html#/s:14DataManagem.name: storeId
Protocols/Movement.html#/s:14DataManagem.abstract: Store Id. Should be used to clasify movements by store

Protocols/Movement.html#/s:14DataManagem.name: categoryId
Protocols/Movement.html#/s:14DataManagem.abstract: Category Id. Should be used to clasify movements by category

Protocols/Movement.html#/s:14DataManagem.name: paymentId
Protocols/Movement.html#/s:14DataManagem.abstract: Payment Id. Is used to have a reference to a multi-payment buy

Protocols/DataSourceRead.html#/s:14DataM.name: getMovementSumByCategory(query:)
Protocols/DataSourceRead.html#/s:14DataM.abstract: Get the sum of movements grouped by category

Protocols/DataSourceRead.html#/s:14DataM.name: getMovementSumByStore(query:)
Protocols/DataSourceRead.html#/s:14DataM.abstract: Get the sum of movements grouped by store

Protocols/DataSourceModify.html.name: DataSourceModify
Protocols/DataSourceModify.html.abstract: Protocol that contains contracts to modify movements

Protocols/DataSourceRead.html.name: DataSourceRead
Protocols/DataSourceRead.html.abstract: Protocol that contains contracts to read movements

Protocols/Movement.html.name: Movement
Protocols/Movement.html.abstract: Protocol that defines the basic structure for a movement

Protocols/MovementsSum.html.name: MovementsSum
Protocols/MovementsSum.html.abstract: Protocol used to represent the sum of movements grouped by category or store
